Package com.terturl.MMO.Quests

Class Quest

java.lang.Object
com.terturl.MMO.Quests.Quest
Direct Known Subclasses:
CustomCraftQuest, EntityKillQuest, LocationQuest, MMOEntityKillQuest, MMOItemCollectQuest, NPCTalkQuest
public abstract class Quest extends Object
Abstract class for creating information about a Quest. Anything from creating, loading, saving, item lore, and more
Since:
0.25.0
Author:
Sean Rahman

  • Method Details

    • clone

      public abstract Object clone()

    • giveRewards

      public void giveRewards​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
      Gives any rewards to the player if their values exist in the Quest information. This can add money, items, recipes, or abilities
      Parameters:
      p - The player that will recieve the rewards of the quest

    • finishQuest

      public void finishQuest​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
      Not to be confused with complete quest, this will only add the quest to a CompletedableQuest list that then the player must go talk to the NPC in order to complete the quest
      Parameters:
      p - The player to update their current characters CompletedableQuest list

    • questItem

      public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack questItem()
      Creates a questItem based off the requirementsLore() and the protected function getRewardsLore()
      Returns:
      See Also:
      requirementsLore()

    • hasComplete

      public abstract boolean hasComplete​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
      Used to check if the player has completed the quest
      Parameters:
      p - Player to be checking
      Returns:
      If the player completed the quest or not

    • completeQuest

      public abstract void completeQuest​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
      Called when the player completes the quest, can be used in junction with creating a new Quest to give more functionality besides base Quests
      Parameters:
      p - Player for using with give items or anything else

    • requirementsLore

      public abstract List<String> requirementsLore()
      The lore that will be added to the QuestItem to be shown to the player where they are in their quest
      Returns:
      A list of strings to add to the QuestItem lore

    • loadQuest

      public abstract void loadQuest​(org.json.simple.JSONObject jo)
      Called from QuestManager to load the default information that has to be accomplished to the quest
      Parameters:
      jo - JSONObject of quest file's Properties object

    • saveQuest

      public abstract org.json.simple.JSONObject saveQuest()
      Called to save the quest to the players JSON save file
      Returns:
      JSONObject to be added to the players file

    • loadQuestToPlayer

      public abstract void loadQuestToPlayer​(org.json.simple.JSONObject jo)
      Used to load the quest from the players save file to load what they have accomplished
      Parameters:
      jo - JSONObject of the information from the players save file
